title: How to Get Free Shipping on Amazon

steps.title: Navigate to Amazon.com or Smile.Amazon.com if you want a portion of the proceeds from your purchase to go to charity.
steps.content: Navigate to Amazon.com or Smile.Amazon.com if you want a portion of the proceeds from your purchase to go to charity.

steps.title: Type your product search terms in the top search bar.
steps.content: Type your product search terms in the top search bar. Click “Enter” or the magnifying glass icon.

steps.title: Go to the left hand column in your search results.
steps.content: Go to the left hand column in your search results. Look for the heading that says “Free Shipping.”

steps.title: Click the link that says “Free Shipping by Amazon.
steps.content: Click the link that says “Free Shipping by Amazon. ” Once you click this link, only items that will be eligible for free shipping (with a $35 purchase) will appear.

steps.title: Add the items you want to your cart.
steps.content: Add the items you want to your cart. Repeat the process with new items you want to buy. Accumulate $35 in purchases.

steps.title: Go to checkout when you are ready.
steps.content: Go to checkout when you are ready. Sign into your account to use previously saved addresses and payment methods.

steps.title: Select a single address in your country.
steps.content: Select a single address in your country. With the $35 minimum, you would need to select an address in the United States.

steps.title: Click the radio button to group the items into as few shipments as possible.
steps.content: Click the radio button to group the items into as few shipments as possible. Other options will require paid shipping.

steps.title: Click the button to choose the Free Shipping option.
steps.content: Click the button to choose the Free Shipping option. Complete your purchase. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Ensure that you have never activated a free trial of Amazon Prime on your account in the past.
steps.content: Ensure that you have never activated a free trial of Amazon Prime on your account in the past. This service is only available to first-time users. During the trial period of several weeks to a month, you can receive free two-day shipping on products that are fulfilled by Amazon, in addition to other services and features.

steps.title: Repeat the steps above to locate products that are fulfilled by Amazon.
steps.content: Repeat the steps above to locate products that are fulfilled by Amazon. These “Free Shipping by Amazon” products are also eligible for 2-day shipping with an Amazon account. Unlike the method above, you don’t need to reach a certain threshold of spending to use this free shipping trial.

steps.title: Click the button that says, “Add to Cart with FREE Two-day Shipping.
steps.content: Click the button that says, “Add to Cart with FREE Two-day Shipping. ”

steps.title: Proceed to checkout.
steps.content: Proceed to checkout. Click “Start my Free Trial. ” Sign up with Amazon Prime. You will need to enter your credit card details or use one of your saved payment methods.

steps.title: Select “Free Two-Day Shipping” before you complete your purchase.
steps.content: Select “Free Two-Day Shipping” before you complete your purchase. Submit your order.

steps.title: Return to your account before the end of your trial to cancel the trial.
steps.content: Return to your account before the end of your trial to cancel the trial. If you do not return, you will be charged $99 for a year membership to Amazon Prime at the end of your trial period.

steps.title: Go to Amazon.com.
steps.content: Go to Amazon.com. Search for the product you want. Click on the desired product when you’ve found it.

steps.title: Find the link at the bottom of the product description that says “5 new from $35.99” or something similar.
steps.content: Find the link at the bottom of the product description that says “5 new from $35.99” or something similar. You can also find this link at the bottom of the “Other Sellers on Amazon” section in the right hand column.

steps.title: View the list of sellers and find one, either Amazon or a third-party seller, that offers free shipping.
steps.content: View the list of sellers and find one, either Amazon or a third-party seller, that offers free shipping. This chart compares prices and shipping for you.

steps.title: Add the product with free shipping to your cart.
steps.content: Add the product with free shipping to your cart. Complete your purchase with this seller. You will not be required to have a minimum purchase; however, other products that you choose to add to your cart will not be eligible for free shipping by a third-party seller.
